word_mean: 鲸蜡：从抹香鲸(Physeter macrocephalus)头部得到的蜡质，白色半透明，稍滑腻，有结晶状裂痕和珍珠样光泽，用于软膏制剂，如冷霜和玫瑰水软膏
从抹香鲸等海产哺乳动物头部提取的液体状蜡，可用做钟表和精密仪表的润滑剂。

sentence.Network_en: The toothed whale has a large square head with a cavity that contains the so - called spermaceti.
sentence.Network_cn: 锯齿鲸拥有很大的头颅.在头颅的腔里含有 所谓 的鲸脑油.

sentence.Network_en: Photo Gallery: Whales Sperm whales'heads are filled with a mysterious substance called spermaceti.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲸鱼图片 美术馆 .巨头鲸(抹香鲸)的头部充满一种神秘的物质叫做鲸脑.

美国大学翻译中文69 - DuSystem Forum... ... 鲸油 blubber 鲸油 spermaceti 鲸目 cetacea.
sperm oil 鲸油spermaceti 鲸腊spew 呕吐

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from medieval Latin, from late Latin sperma 'sperm' + ceti 'of a whale' (genitive of cetus, from Greek kētos 'whale'), from the belief that it was whale spawn

means.word_mean: 1. a white waxy substance from oil of the sperm whale

auth_sentence.content: Its name derives from a waxy liquid called "spermaceti", found in its enormous head.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its name derives from a waxy liquid called "spermaceti", found in its enormous head.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its name derives from a waxy liquid called "spermaceti", found in its enormous head.

auth_sentence.content: The head of the whale contains a liquid wax called "spermaceti", which was used in lubricants, oil lamps, and candles.
